alert.note: Alert for Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:32AM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 131 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weston, or 6 miles southwest of Wahoo, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Malmo around 135 AM CDT. Wahoo and Ithaca around 140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mead, Colon, Yutan, Leshara and Woodcliff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
